## QueryIndices class

Class to easily manage Indices filtering in a query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryIndices 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(value)](./doofinder.queryindices.add.md) |  | Add a value to the set of Indices used to filter. |
|  [clear()](./doofinder.queryindices.clear.md) |  | Clear all values used to filter by Index. |
|  [dump()](./doofinder.queryindices.dump.md) |  | Dump the Indices set as an array of strings. |
|  [has(value)](./doofinder.queryindices.has.md) |  | Check whether the set of Indices selected contain the provided value. |
|  [remove(value)](./doofinder.queryindices.remove.md) |  | Remove a index from the set of Indices selected. |
|  [set(value)](./doofinder.queryindices.set.md) |  | Set the Indices to use to filter a query. |
